name: CollatingIterator_setIteratorTest
description: Unit tests for the setIterator method of the CollatingIterator class.

test_cases.name: testSetIterator_Success
test_cases.description: Tests the successful setting of an iterator in the CollatingIterator.

test_cases.name: testSetIterator_NullIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior when attempting to set a null iterator in the CollatingIterator, expecting a NullPointerException.

test_cases.name: testSetIterator_IterationStarted
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior when attempting to set an iterator after the iteration has started, expecting an IllegalStateException.
